title: Animal Horns
description: What do sheep and bulls have in common? They both have horns, like many other animals! Read Animal Horns to discover more about this animal feature. Vivid photos will capture students' interest as they learn about adjectives and comparing and contrasting.
reviewWords: antelope, curved, fighting, horns, scratching, straight
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast information
